data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Hengyang, Hunan, China that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Hengyang, Hunan, China

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Hengyang, Hunan, China to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Hengyang to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Hengyang, Hunan, China. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Iu Mien, Changping people.
Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the county of Hengyang to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Hengyang access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Hengyang. Through your servants plant 281 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

location.name: Hengyang
location.people_groups_list: Kim Mun, Ghao-Xong, Eastern, Iu Mien, Luoxiang, Tujia, Hmu, Southern
